item.title: Installing Nginx Server
item.description: Installing Nginx Server How To Install Nginx on Ubuntu 18.04[^1] Introduction Nginx is one of the most popular web servers in the world and is responsible for hosting some of the largest and highest-traffic sites on the internet.
